Object.Field: LKM SQL to Object Storage Direct
SNP_TRT : LKM SQL to Object Storage

COMPONENT NAME: LKM SQL to Object Storage Direct COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.2.1.4.0 or above
DESCRIPTION This LKM will upload the result of a SQL query to Oracle Object Storage. Transformations are supported on source only.
If set to True the Object Storage target file will be overwritten.
Set to true if you want to store data as XML file in Object Storage.
Character encoding indicated in the XML declaration header of the export file.
Set this property to True if you want to compress source data before loading into Object Storage. Additional options COMPRESSION_TYPE and KEEP_SOURCE_FILES define compression preferences.
Select the type of compression you want to apply on source data before loadining into Object Storage.
Keep original source files after compression(True/False)
Set to True (default) if you want to compress files and keep originals. Note that gzip supports keep option starting from version 1.6.
SNP_TRT : LKM File to Object Storage #SNP_LINETRT : Upload file to Object Storage
SNP_TRT : LKM File to Object Storage Direct #SNP_LINETRT : Cleanup log files
SNP_TRT : LKM File to Object Storage Direct #SNP_LINETRT : Compress file
